String.string: Something's going on. Everyone's really on edge. Have you heard anything?
When Tetra Aniask is stressed, everyone is stressed.
All they have to do is use the weapons...but they can't even do that right.
If I was in charge, Crescentia would be smoking rubble already.
Don't let Tetra Aniask hear you saying stuff like that. She'll have your head torn off and thrown to a basilisk!
Attention! Attention! All soldiers assemble in front of the armory!
You heard the order. Let's go!
